backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Internet Computer actor with no methods implemented due to missing specifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a high-confidence frontend change updating the description text of the first visible gallery image in siteConfig.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of key frontend source files, components, configuration, and styling for build and feature planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables, borders, and base background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app to the root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that applies theme support and conditionally renders site sections based on sectionVisibility config.
frontend/src/components/FinaleSection.ts: Romantic finale section displaying animated icons, heartfelt messages, and a signature birthday message from Avdhesh.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component that shows attribution, animated heart icon, and dynamic navigation links based on enabled sections.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Gallery section that renders visible images from config as cards and opens a modal for the selected image.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with dynamic navigation, theme toggle, branding, and smooth scrolling to enabled sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Intro hero section with birthday messaging, decorative backgrounds, and CTA buttons that link to enabled sections.
frontend/src/components/ImageCard.tsx: Reusable animated card component for gallery images with lazy loading, hover effects, and title/description display.
frontend/src/components/ImageModal.tsx: React modal component that displays a selected image with title and description using a Dialog UI, including a close button and optional debug info (image ID and filename).
frontend/src/components/MusicControl.tsx: Floating music player control that plays/pauses a looping background audio track and allows volume adjustment via a popover slider.
frontend/src/components/RobloxSection.ts: Static presentation section highlighting shared Roblox experiences with themed text, icons, and an image, styled for a romantic gaming theme.
frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts: Central configuration file defining section visibility flags, navigation types, debug toggles, and a gallery image dataset with metadata and optional hidden flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook intended for future backend query implementations, currently returning an empty object.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, romantic color palette, dark mode overrides, base styles, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, scanning frontend source files, and extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom radii, fonts, shadows, and layout settings. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations to support a design-system-driven UI.

Acts as a living record of scope, features, and design-system decisions for planning and iteration.
